sentences.sContent: You'll soon begin to reap the benefits of being fitter.
sentences.sCn: 你很快就会获得身体更健康带来的好处。

sentences.sContent: ...dependence on agro-chemicals that poison soils but reap large-scale benefits mostly to the American multi-national corporations...

remMethod.val: 稻子成熟(ripe)了可以收割(reap)了

trans.tranCn: 收割， 收获； 获得， 得到
trans.tranOther: to get something, especially something good, as a result of what you have done
